review.cons: Cons – High requirements, exhausting working schedule
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Disorganized”
review.pros: Pros – Get to work with children - great hours - not bad pay
review.cons: Cons – Disorganized management - ideas not listened to - safety and CPR courses are skimmed through.

review.title: “They love to pick favorites.”
review.pros: Pros – Loved working with the kids and getting to know the parents. As an employee you get a discount for your children to attend.
review.cons: Cons – Most of the workers were very immature. This of course was attributed to everyone being so young but some of the behavior should not have been tolerated by management.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop picking favorites and go by the actual work that is being done.

review.title: “Okay if this is all you want to do.”
review.pros: Pros – *Has good child care discounts for employees
review.cons: Cons – *no raises*minimal vacation increase*no benefits*lack of supplies in classroom, sometimes teachers have to buy curriculum dependent supplies*high worker (at all levels) turnover*very little prep time allowed for lessons, no appreciation for staying past clock-out to keep classroom functional.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – If you want professional teachers then you need to treat your employees as professionals.
